City Council
============

![Hutto City Councilmembers 2025](https://www.huttotx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6024 "Hutto City Councilmembers 2025")

Pictured City Council taken in June 2025

Election Day is Saturday, May 2, 2026. The following City Council positions will be on the ballot: Councilmember Place 1 and Councilmember Place 4. [Learn more about how to file for candidacy here.](https://www.huttotx.gov/800/May-2-2026-City-Council-Election)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Regular Meetings
----------------

* 7 pm 1st and 3rd Thursday of every month
* Special-called meetings as needed
* Hutto City Hall Council Chambers: 500 W Live Oak Street, Hutto, TX 78634

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.huttotx.gov/129/Agendas-Minutes)

Members
-------

The Hutto City Council is composed of the Mayor and six other Council members. The Mayor and all Council members are elected from the City at large and each Council member occupies a position on the City Council. The positions are numbered 1 through 6 consecutively. The Mayor and the City Council members are elected to serve three-year terms.

* [Mike Snyder](https://www.huttotx.gov/434/Mike-Snyder), Mayor
* [Charles Warner](https://www.huttotx.gov/721/Charles-Warner), Council Place 1
* [Dan Thornton](https://www.huttotx.gov/435/Dan-Thornton), Mayor Pro Tem, Council Place 2
* [Jim Morris](https://www.huttotx.gov/812/Jim-Morris), Council Place 3
* [Peter Gordon](https://www.huttotx.gov/438/Peter-Gordon), Council Place 4
* [Evan Porterfield](https://www.huttotx.gov/815/7951/Evan-Porterfield), Council Place 5
* [Aaron King](https://www.huttotx.gov/813/Aaron-King), Council Place 6
